91 = 7 * 13

n = 13082761331670030
is the product of primes from 2 to 43

http://oeis.org/A066498
http://oeis.org/A102306

http://oeis.org/A193417

[210, [2, 3, 5, 7], [121, 151]]
[2310, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11], [331, 991]]
[30030, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13], [991, 9571, 12541, 13861, 17161, 21121, 25411, 25741]]
[510510, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17], [145861, 162691, 235621, 241231, 314161, 381481, 437581, 460021]]
[9699690, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17, 19], [241231, 437581, 746131, 970531, 1183711, 2356201, 2479621, 3012571, 3208921, 3225751, 3304291, 3955051, 4398241, 4594591, 5250961, 5340721, 5542681, 5997091, 6075631, 6288811, 6636631, 7382761, 7461301, 7898881, 8314021, 9060151]]


210: 2 * 3 * 5 * 7
121 and 151: 120 and 150, + 1, respectively
121 = 1 + 120 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 2 * 3 * 5
151 = 1 + 150 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 5 * 5

2310: 2x3x5x7x11
331 = 1 + 330 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 5 * 11
991 = 1 + 990 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 3 * 5 * 11

30030: [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13]
991 = 1 + 990 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 3 * 5 * 11
9571 = 1 + 9570 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 5 * 11 * 29
12541 = 1 + 12540 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 3 * 5 * 11 * 19
13861 = 1 + 13860 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 3 * 3 * 5 * 7 * 11
17161 = 1 + 17160 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 2 * 3 * 5 * 11 * 13
21121 = 1 + 21120 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 2 * 2 * 2 * 2 * 2 * 3 * 5 * 11
25411 = 1 + 25410 = 1 + 2 * 3 * 5 * 7 * 11 * 11
25741 = 1 + 25740 = 1 + 2 * 2 * 3 * 3 * 5 * 11 * 13

[210, [2, 3, 5, 7], [[121, 32], [151, 40]]]
[2310, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11], [[331, 80], [991, 240]]]
[30030, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13], [[991, 240], [9571, 2240], [12541, 2880], [13861, 2880], [17161, 3840], [21121, 5120], [25411, 5280], [25741, 5760]]]
[510510, [2, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13, 17], [[145861, 30720], [162691, 35840], [235621, 46080], [241231, 53760], [314161, 61440], [381481, 87040], [437581, 92160], [460021, 102400]]]
